page.title: 06PRIMARY TEACHER SKEGNESS
page.content: This is the diary of a typical day for me.I am a teacher at a medium sized primary school which has 205 pupils from 5 years to 11 years old.I teach a class of 32 10 year olds. {0615hrs.}Rise prepare breakfast walk dog. {0800hrs.}Leave home for school..arrive at school 0810.Prepare audio visual equipment for the day.Prepare first lesson of day. {0900hrs.}Children enter for morning session.15 mins break @1030. {1200-1315}Lunch ..spent marking and preparing work. {1315-1530}Afternoon session. {1530}Any after school clubs take place now.Mark books..put away equipment. {1630/1700}Leave school ..go home spend about 2 hours marking books or doing other school work then enjoy my family.For this work I earn Â£8 800 pa.
